description: Pay for the next renewal of a PremiumDNS object.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: PremiumDNS payment order action:CREATE - create a PremiumDNS payment orderREPLACE - replace a PremiumDNS payment orderUPDATE - update a PremiumDNS payment order
PremiumDNS payment order ID; only relevant if ORDER is REPLACE or UPDATE
